attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain should withdraw from participating in any future Eurovision Song contests, due to the political nature of voting displayed by countries who vote for their neighbours with no regard whatsoever to the ‘musical or otherwise’ content of the entries. We are demeaned as a nation by being involved in this appalling display of nepotism, apart from the fact that dire presentations and presenters take up prime time on our TV screens during Saturday night viewing. We need to regain some national respect by refusing to be involved with this fiasco any more.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
